statements: SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT * FROM backtest_results;
SELECT strategy_id, profit FROM backtest_results WHERE profit > 10000;
SELECT start_date, end_date FROM backtest_results ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_scenarios WHERE simulation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT scenario_name, initial_investment FROM investment_scenarios ORDER BY initial_investment DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, start_date, end_date, profit FROM backtest_results WHERE profit > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT initial_investment, simulation_date, scenario_name FROM investment_scenarios WHERE initial_investment BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY scenario_name ASC
SELECT strategy_id, end_date, profit FROM backtest_results WHERE end_date <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT scenario_name, initial_investment FROM investment_scenarios WHERE simulation_date = '2021-10-15' ORDER BY initial_investment DESC
SELECT strategy_id, profit FROM backtest_results JOIN investment_scenarios ON backtest_results.strategy_id = investment_scenarios.scenario_id WHERE initial_investment > 20000 ORDER BY profit ASC
SELECT * FROM backtest_results;
SELECT backtest_id, strategy_name FROM backtest_results ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT backtest_id, performance FROM backtest_results WHERE strategy_name = 'MACD' OR strategy_name = 'RSI' ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT MAX(performance) AS max_performance, MIN(performance) AS min_performance FROM backtest_results;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT scenario_name, investment_amount FROM investment_scenarios WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
